page.title: 20SCHOOLBOY LIFE IN 1985.
page.content: At 10.30 the bell rings and if the weather is fine we all go outside for fifteen minutes play. I often play {football.}Work continues till lunchtime 12.00. We eat lunch at School either bringing our own sandwiches or having a{school prepared {meal.}In the afternoon, which starts at 13.15 we work on project studies or have music, art, games and more practical work. We finish school at 15.15 and I have someone who takes me from school to her house. She has children of her who are 6 and 8. Every Thursday after school I go to the village hall for Junior Church and afterwards I go to tea with my {child-minder.}My mother collects me at 18.00 and we go home. Then I either play with my friends, use my computer, watch television and have something to eat. I go to bed at 21.00.
